phyf 0.0.0.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference
    • Tree Arithmetic with Phylogenetic Flows
  • Blog

Scale the phylogenetic flow features to a constant sum.

pf_scale_flow_sum.Rd

Can be used to standardise branch lengths to reasonable values

Usage

pf_scale_flow_sum(x, scale_to = 1)

Arguments

x

a pfc object

scale_to

The value to scale the sums to. Default is 1.

Value

a scaled pfc object

Examples

pf_scale_flow_sum(rpfc(100))
#> <pfc<e:198>[198]>
#> First  10 phylogenetic flows: 
#> [1] ◎──0.527──→ Node3 ──0.424──→ Node26 ──0.037──→ Node59 ──0.013──→ t82
